channel.title: Work on OpenDC Ltd - Fr
channel.description: Recent content in Work on OpenDC Ltd - Fr

item.title: Fr - SENSE tool
item.description: Client: Movement Strategies Ltd Sector: Pedestrian modelling What we did: Fr - We developed a pedestrian dynamic assignment software, with an assignment algorithm based on fluid mechanics principles. The tool can assign an unlimited number of pedestrians, at any scale and cutom flow desnity relationship can be implemented. How we use open data or software: The tool was computed as a QGIS plugin, open source software providing an open source API.
